turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a charge on my latest bill. I was charged $75 for a service I didn't request and never used. I'm really frustrated because this keeps happening!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello. I understand your frustration. I'm sorry you were charged incorrectly. Can you please provide your account number or the phone number associated with your account?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 555-123-4567. So, what exactly is this $75 charge for? I went through my plan details online and I don't see anything about this.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, one moment while I access your account information. ... I see the charge here. It appears to be for a 'Premium Entertainment Package'. I can remove this charge immediately. I can also refund the amount to your account. Does that sound right?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, please remove the charge and refund the amount! But how did this package even get added to my account in the first place? Is there some kind of security issue? I'm worried this could happen again.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: We are unsure how the package was added at this time. I have removed the charge and issued a refund of $75 to your account. Please allow 3-5 business days for the refund to be reflected in your statement. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, that's good to hear about the refund. I guess that's all for now. Thanks for your help... I still wish I knew *how* it happened, though. Guess I'll just have to keep a closer eye on my bill.
